content.question: Which statement best describes the effect of the rhymed pairing “Never” and “ever” in line 15 ?

choices.label: It diminishes the sense of unity in an intellectual relationship.
It highlights the need for persistence in developing strong friendships.
It reinforces the idea that friendships develop in unpredictable ways.
It emphasizes the similarity within a seemingly contradictory situation.

content.answer: It emphasizes the similarity within a seemingly contradictory situation.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
